amendment.description: To provide post-employment lobbying restrictions on employees of the Department of Homeland Security and the Office of Homeland Security within the Executive Office of the President.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1383 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 46. Record Vote Number: 305.

action.text: Amendment SA 1383 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9872-9874; text: CR S9874) To provide post-employment lobbying restrictions on employees of the Department of Homeland Security and the Office of Homeland Security within the Executive Office of the President.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1383 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1383 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 46. Record Vote Number: 305.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1383 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 46. Record Vote Number: 305.
